metadata.title: Stance Cadent Crew Socks
features: Comfy Butter Blend Socks: Seamless toe closure gives your feet less friction and more protection
Arch Support Socks: Stance men's and women's socks offer proper foot care during daily activities
Targeted Cushioning: These crew socks have targeted cushioning for added comfort where you need it most
Outdoor Activities with Stance: Your go-to partner in golf, basketball, baseball, and other sports
About Stance: We blend innovation and design in knitwear for the best possible performance
description: Include these socks in your sock drawer and get the best of your daily performance. Our crew socks boast a high-quality Butter Blend that provides exceptional comfort, breathability, and strength. Targeted cushioning offers a more secure fit for great impact protection and comfort. Don't forget the seamless toe closure that provides comfort your feet will love. Enrich your outdoor clothing with these fun socks.We have turned socks, these very unappreciated pieces of clothing, into one of the world's most exciting accessories in less than five years. Our founders saw a category that had been ignored, taken for granted, looked over, and dismissed. By putting life into something that had been overlooked, we ignited a movement of art and self-expression that has drawn athletes, performers, and iconic cultural influencers to the brand, a group we call the Punks & Poets. By underpinning our creative roots with a relentless focus on technical innovation, we've ensured that Stance socks are now found in over 40 countries on the feet of those who dare to be different.Stance exists to celebrate human originality. We are constantly improving our entrepreneurship, creativity, performance, and personal responsibility. At Stance, we believe that difference inspires our culture, stories, and products. We celebrate divergent perspectives that spark original solutions. We live at the intersection of art and science, designing socks, hoodies, T-shirts, underwear, and face masks that perform at the highest level while inspiring the human spirit.
